parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all alive and dead entities of the given type or deriving from the given type. Units in vehicles are ignored with the primary syntax.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> '''Optimisation tip''': Keep number of types in both ''includeTypes'' and ''excludeTypes'' arrays to a minimum by possibly using parent/base classes.<br>If you have to use several types, arrange them in order so that the more common types go at the beginning of the array.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[entities]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - if an empty string <tt>""</tt> is provided, all entities are returned

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[entities]] [typesInclude, typesExclude, includeCrews, excludeDead] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.65.138685</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> typesInclude: [[Array]] - in format [type1, type2, ...typeN], where type is a [[String]]. Empty array [] means include every entity. Method used for filtering - [[isKindOf]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> typesExclude: [[Array]] - in format [type1, type2, ...typeN], where type is a [[String]]. Empty array [] means exclude no entity. Method used for filtering - [[isKindOf]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> includeCrews: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) include crews currently in vehicles

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> excludeDead: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) exclude dead entities

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allcars = [[entities]] "Car";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Return all alive entities on the map:<code>_allalive = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], [], [[true]], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Return dead and alive entities but logic:<code>_notlogic = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], ["Logic"], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Return all alive [[west]] soldiers on foot:<code>_footsoldiers = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["SoldierWB"], [], [[false]], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[nearEntities]], [[allUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[agents]], [[allMissionObjects]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
